output.question_text: How many units of humanoid robots will be cumulatively sold globally for performing domestic tasks before 2031?
output.markdown:
- The global humanoid robot market is expected to achieve a compound annual growth rate of 71% from 2021 to 2030, indicating a strong market potential that could be driven by the needs of an aging population in the Asia Pacific region. [Source Published on 2024-08-26](https://www.scmp.com/economy/china-economy/article/3275936/china-upgrades-its-androids-more-human-human-horizon#:~:text=According%20to%20the%20International%20Federation,about%20their%20products%20and%20.)
- The manufacturing cost of humanoid robots has dropped significantly, with costs now ranging from $30,000 to $150,000, a 40% decline from previous estimates, which could accelerate consumer applications by two to four years. [Source Published on 2024-02-27](https://www.goldmansachs.com/intelligence/pages/the-global-market-for-robots-could-reach-38-billion-by-2035.html#:~:text=The%20manufacturing%20cost%20of%20humanoid,Goldman%20Sachs%20Research%E2%80%99s%20prior%20estimates.)
- The Chinese Ministry of Industry and Information Technology predicts that humanoids are likely to become a disruptive technology similar to computers or smartphones, with mass production goals set for 2025. [Source Published on 2024-02-16](https://www.roboticstomorrow.com/story/2024/02/top-5-robot-trends-2024-%e2%80%93-international-federation-of-robotics-reports/22085#:~:text=The%20Chinese%20Ministry%20of%20Industry,like%20mobile%20manipulators%2C%20for%20example.)
- The total addressable market for humanoid robots is projected to reach $38 billion by 2035, up from a previous projection of $6 billion, due to significant progress in AI, including robotic large language models. [Source Published on 2024-02-27](https://www.goldmansachs.com/intelligence/pages/the-global-market-for-robots-could-reach-38-billion-by-2035.html#:~:text=The%20total%20addressable%20market%20for,to%20code%20everything%20by%20hand.)

output.question_text: How many of the 10 most important advancements in machine learning or artificial intelligence of 2025-2030 will have been discovered by an AI system?
output.markdown:
- AlphaTensor discovered a matrix multiplication algorithm using 76 multiplications, improving on state-of-the-art algorithms and Strassen's two-level algorithm for the first time in 50 years, as reported on October 5, 2022. [Source Published on 2022-10-05](https://www.deepmind.com/blog/discovering-novel-algorithms-with-alphatensor#:~:text=Single%2Dplayer%20game%20played%20by%20AlphaTensor%2C,its%20discovery%2050%20years%20ago.)
- AlphaDev, an AI developed by DeepMind, discovered a sorting algorithm that was 29 assembly instructions shorter than the human benchmark, marking the first update to the C++ Standard Library sorting algorithms in over a decade and the first to involve an algorithm discovered using AI. [Source Published on 2023-06-12](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AlphaDev#:~:text=For%20example%2C%20for%20VarSort4%20%28sort,an%20algorithm%20discovered%20using%20AI.)
- In January 2023, DeepMind added its AI-discovered hashing algorithm for inputs from 9 to 16 bytes to Abseil, an open-source collection of prewritten C++ algorithms. [Source Published on 2023-06-12](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AlphaDev#:~:text=In%20January%202022%2C%20Google%20DeepMind,trillions%20of%20times%20every%20day.)
- A study published in Nature in December 2023 demonstrated that large language models can be used to discover effective heuristics for combinatorial optimization problems, indicating potential for autonomous algorithm discovery. [Source Published on 2023-12-14](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41586-023-06924-6%7C#:~:text=In%20this%20section%2C%20we%20show,to%20all%20items%20in%20advance%29.)
- The AI system developed by Northwestern University compresses billions of years of evolution into an instant, suggesting that AI can significantly accelerate the discovery process of new algorithms. [Source Published on 2023-10-03](https://news.northwestern.edu/stories/2023/10/instant-evolution-ai-designs-new-robot-from-scratch-in-seconds#:~:text=%E2%80%9CEvolving%20robots%20previously%20required%20weeks,for%20walking%20as%20nature%3A%20legs.)

output.question_text: Will OpenAI's o1 remain the top LLM in all categories of Chatbot Arena on December 30, 2024?
output.markdown:
- OpenAI's o1 model has shown a significant improvement in problem-solving capabilities, scoring 83% on a qualifying exam for the International Mathematics Olympiad compared to the previous best model, GPT-4o, which scored only 13%. [Source Published on 2024-10-01](https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-024-03169-9#:~:text=Its%20previous%20best%20model%2C%20GPT%2D4o%2C,the%20user%2C%20alongside%20its%20answers.)
- GPT-4o matches GPT-4 Turbo performance on text in English and code, with significant improvement on text in non-English languages, while also being much faster and 50% cheaper in the API, which could be a competitive threat to ChatGPT 5. [Source Published on 2024-06-27](https://openai.com/index/gpt-4o-system-card/#:~:text=It%E2%80%99s%20trained%20end%2Dto%2Dend%20across%20text%2C,understanding%20compared%20to%20existing%20models.)
- In November, a record-breaking nine new models were added, with sizes ranging from 7B to 70B, and gathered over 25,000 new votes, indicating a highly dynamic and competitive environment. [Source Published on 2023-12-07](https://lmsys.org/blog/2023-12-07-leaderboard/#:~:text=We%20believe%20such%20a%20scale,delivering%20close%20to%20gpt%2D3.5%20performance.)
- Since the launch of Chatbot Arena in May, over 45 models have been deployed, indicating a competitive environment where maintaining top rankings can be challenging. [Source Published on 2023-12-07](https://lmsys.org/blog/2023-12-07-leaderboard/#:~:text=We%20believe%20deploying%20chat%20models,valid%20votes%20from%20our%20users.)
- The gap between proprietary and open models is narrowing, with new models like Tulu-2-DPO-70B and Yi-34B-Chat delivering performance close to GPT-3.5. [Source Published on 2023-12-07](https://lmsys.org/blog/2023-12-07-leaderboard/#:~:text=We%20believe%20such%20a%20scale,delivering%20close%20to%20gpt%2D3.5%20performance.)
- gpt2-chatbots have surged to the top of Chatbot Arena, surpassing all models by a significant gap of approximately 50 Elo, making it the strongest model ever in the Arena as of May 13, 2024. [Source Published on 2024-05-13](https://twitter.com/lmsysorg/status/1790097588399779991#:~:text=Breaking%20news%20%E2%80%94%20gpt2%2Dchatbots%20result,app%20can%20build%20on%20top.)
- GPT-4o is especially better at vision and audio understanding compared to existing models, which could pose a challenge to ChatGPT 5's dominance if it does not match these capabilities. [Source Published on 2024-06-27](https://openai.com/index/gpt-4o-system-card/#:~:text=It%E2%80%99s%20trained%20end%2Dto%2Dend%20across%20text%2C,understanding%20compared%20to%20existing%20models.)
